verses.verse: וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ve-'Ish Now the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> nish-Ba' had sworn בַּמִּצְפָּ֖ה <WH4709> bam-mitz-Pah in Mizpeh לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish There shall not any מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu, at לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> yit-Ten of us give בִּתּ֛וֹ <WH1323> bit-To his daughter לְבִנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> le-vin-ya-Min unto Benjamin לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> le-'ish-Shah. to wife

וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo came הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am And the people בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֔ל <WH1008> 'El, to Bethel וַיֵּ֤שְׁבוּ <WH3427> vai-Ye-she-vu and abode שָׁם֙ <WH8033> sham there עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until הָעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> ha-'E-rev, there till even לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; God וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> vai-yis-'U and lifted up קוֹלָ֔ם <WH6963> ko-Lam, their voices וַיִּבְכּ֖וּ <WH1058> vai-yiv-Ku and wept בְּכִ֥י <WH1065> be-Chi overflowing גָדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> ga-Dol. sore

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, And said לָמָ֗ה <WH4100> la-Mah, Why יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הָ֥יְתָה <WH1961> Ha-ye-tah come זֹּ֖את <WH2063> zot in בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El; why is this come to pass in Israel לְהִפָּקֵ֥ד <WH6485> le-hip-pa-Ked lacking הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom that there should be to day מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> mi-Yis-ra-'El of Israel שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> She-vet tribe אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. one

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi came מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> mi-mo-cho-Rat, And it came to pass on the morrow וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣ימוּ <WH7925> vai-yash-Ki-mu rose early הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, that the people וַיִּבְנוּ־ <WH1129> vai-yiv-nu- and built שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> sham there מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> miz-Be-ach; there an altar וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu and offered עֹל֖וֹת <WH5930> o-Lot burnt offerings וּשְׁלָמִֽים׃ <WH8002> u-she-la-Mim. and peace offerings פ Peh

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru said בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מִ֠י <WH4310> mi Who אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not עָלָ֧ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah came בַקָּהָ֛ל <WH6951> vak-ka-Hal not up with the congregation מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> shiv-Tei Who [is there] among all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; to the LORD כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki for הַשְּׁבוּעָ֨ה <WH7621> hash-she-vu-'Ah oath הַגְּדוֹלָ֜ה <WH1419> hag-ge-do-Lah A great הָיְתָ֗ה <WH1961> ha-ye-Tah, become לַ֠אֲשֶׁר <WH834> La-'a-Sher who לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not עָלָ֨ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah concerning him that came not up אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD הַמִּצְפָּ֛ה <WH4709> ham-mitz-Pah to Mizpeh לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> le-Mor saying מ֥וֹת <WH4191> Mot He shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> yu-Mat. be put to death

וַיִּנָּֽחֲמוּ֙ <WH5162> vai-yin-na-cha-Mu repented בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about בִּנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> bin-ya-Min them for Benjamin אָחִ֑יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv; their brother וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and said נִגְדַּ֥ע <WH1438> nig-Da' cut off הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom this day שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> She-vet tribe אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad There is one מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> mi-Yis-ra-'El. from Israel

מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What נַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> na-'a-Seh How shall we do לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem לַנּוֹתָרִ֖ים <WH3498> lan-no-ta-Rim for them that remain לְנָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> le-na-Shim; for wives וַאֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <WH587> va-'a-Nach-nu we נִשְׁבַּ֣עְנוּ <WH7650> nish-Ba'-nu seeing we have sworn בַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, by the LORD לְבִלְתִּ֛י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti not תֵּת־ <WH5414> tet- that we will not give לָהֶ֥ם la-Hem מִבְּנוֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH1323> mib-be-no-Tei-nu them of our daughters לְנָשִֽׁים׃ <WH802> le-na-Shim. wives

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, And they said מִ֗י <WH4310> Mi, What אֶחָד֙ <WH259> 'e-Chad What one מִשִּׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> mish-shiv-Tei [is there] of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- no עָלָ֥ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah that came not up אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD הַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <WH4709> ham-mitz-Pah; to Mizpeh וְ֠הִנֵּה <WH2009> Ve-hin-neh behold לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo no בָא־ <WH935> va- had come אִ֧ישׁ <WH376> 'ish none אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֛ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh to the camp מִיָּבֵ֥ישׁ <WH3003> mi-ya-Veish Jobesh גִּלְעָ֖ד <WH1568> gil-'Ad Gilead אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַקָּהָֽל׃ <WH6951> hak-ka-Hal. to the assembly

וַיִּתְפָּקֵ֖ד <WH6485> vai-yit-pa-Ked were numbered הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; For the people וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold אֵֽין־ <WH369> 'ein- else שָׁם֙ <WH8033> sham was there אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, and behold [there were] none מִיּוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> mi-yo-she-Vei of the inhabitants יָבֵ֥שׁ <WH3003> ya-Vesh Jobesh גִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> gil-'Ad. Gilead

וַיִּשְׁלְחוּ־ <WH7971> vai-yish-le-chu- sent שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> sham there הָעֵדָ֗ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah, And the congregation שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> she-neim- both עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish men מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> mib-be-Nei warriors הֶחָ֑יִל <WH2428> he-Cha-yil; of the valiant וַיְצַוּ֨וּ <WH6680> vay-tzav-Vu and commanded אוֹתָ֜ם <WH853> o-Tam לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, them saying לְ֠כוּ <WH1980> Le-chu Go וְהִכִּיתֶ֞ם <WH5221> ve-hik-ki-Tem and smite אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יוֹשְׁבֵ֨י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei the inhabitants יָבֵ֤שׁ <WH3003> ya-Vesh Jobesh גִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> gil-'Ad Gilead לְפִי־ <WH6310> le-fi- with the edge חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev, of the sword וְהַנָּשִׁ֖ים <WH802> ve-han-na-Shim with the women וְהַטָּֽף׃ <WH2945> ve-hat-Taf. and the children

וְזֶ֥ה <WH2088> ve-Zeh This הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> had-da-Var And this [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher you תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su; that ye shall do כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every זָכָ֗ר <WH2145> za-Char, every male וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and every אִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah and every woman יֹדַ֥עַת <WH3045> yo-Da-'at by man מִשְׁכַּב־ <WH4904> mish-kav- that hath lain זָכָ֖ר <WH2145> za-Char A man תַּחֲרִֽימוּ׃ <WH2763> ta-cha-Ri-mu. Ye shall utterly destroy

וַֽיִּמְצְא֞וּ <WH4672> vai-yim-tze-'U And they found מִיּוֹשְׁבֵ֣י׀ <WH3427> mi-yo-she-Vei among the inhabitants יָבֵ֣ישׁ <WH3003> ya-Veish Jobesh גִּלְעָ֗ד <WH1568> gil-'Ad, Gilead אַרְבַּ֤ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' four מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> me-'Ot hundred נַעֲרָ֣ה <WH5291> na-'a-Rah young בְתוּלָ֔ה <WH1330> ve-tu-Lah, virgins אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- had not יָדְעָ֛ה <WH3045> ya-de-'Ah that had known אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish no man לְמִשְׁכַּ֣ב <WH4904> le-mish-Kav by lying זָכָ֑ר <WH2145> za-Char; with any male וַיָּבִ֨יאוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vi-'u and they brought אוֹתָ֤ם <WH853> o-Tam אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh them unto the camp שִׁלֹ֔ה <WH7887> shi-Loh, to Shiloh אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz which [is] in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan ס sa-Mek

וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <WH7971> vai-yish-le-Chu sent כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah, And the whole congregation וַֽיְדַבְּרוּ֙ <WH1696> vay-dab-be-Ru [some] to speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei to the children בִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> vin-ya-Min, of Benjamin אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בְּסֶ֣לַע <WH5553> be-Se-la' that [were] in the rock רִמּ֑וֹן <WH7417> rim-Mon; Rimmon וַיִּקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> vai-yik-re-'U and to call לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> sha-Lom. peaceably

וַיָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shov came again בִּנְיָמִן֙ <WH1144> bin-ya-Min And Benjamin בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> ba-'Et at that time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> ha-Hi, and they וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nu and they gave לָהֶם֙ la-Hem הַנָּשִׁ֔ים <WH802> han-na-Shim, them wives אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom חִיּ֔וּ <WH2421> chi-Yu, which they had saved alive מִנְּשֵׁ֖י <WH802> min-ne-Shei of the women יָבֵ֣שׁ <WH3003> ya-Vesh Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> gil-'Ad; Gilead וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not מָצְא֥וּ <WH4672> ma-tze-'U and yet so they sufficed לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> Ken. enough

וְהָעָ֥ם <WH5971> ve-ha-'Am And the people נִחָ֖ם <WH5162> ni-Cham repented לְבִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> le-vin-ya-Min; them for Benjamin כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because עָשָׂ֧ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah had made יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh because that the LORD פֶּ֖רֶץ <WH6556> Pe-retz a breach בְּשִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> be-shiv-Tei in the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיֹּֽאמְר֨וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru said זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> zik-Nei Then the elders הָעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah, of the congregation מַה־ <WH4100> mah- shall we נַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> na-'a-Seh How shall we do לַנּוֹתָרִ֖ים <WH3498> lan-no-ta-Rim for them that remain לְנָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> le-na-Shim; for wives כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- since נִשְׁמְדָ֥ה <WH8045> nish-me-Dah are destroyed מִבִּנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> mib-bin-ya-Min Benjamin אִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> 'ish-Shah. seeing the women

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, And they said יְרֻשַּׁ֥ת <WH3425> ye-rush-Shat [There must be] an inheritance פְּלֵיטָ֖ה <WH6413> pe-lei-Tah for them that be escaped לְבִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> le-vin-ya-Min; of Benjamin וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- so יִמָּחֶ֥ה <WH4229> yim-ma-Cheh be not destroyed שֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> She-vet that a tribe מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> mi-Yis-ra-'El. out of Israel

וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <WH587> va-'a-Nach-nu, ourselves לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not נוּכַ֛ל <WH3201> nu-Chal Howbeit we may לָתֵת־ <WH5414> la-tet- not give לָהֶ֥ם la-Hem נָשִׁ֖ים <WH802> na-Shim them wives מִבְּנוֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH1323> mib-be-no-Tei-nu; of our daughters כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for נִשְׁבְּע֤וּ <WH7650> nish-be-'U have sworn בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- for the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying אָר֕וּר <WH779> 'a-Rur Cursed נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> no-Ten [be] he that giveth אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah a wife לְבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> le-vin-ya-Min. to Benjamin ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּאמְר֡וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru Then they said הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold חַג־ <WH2282> chag- Behold [there is] a feast יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּשִׁל֜וֹ <WH7887> be-shi-Lo in Shiloh מִיָּמִ֣ים׀ <WH3117> mi-ya-Mim year יָמִ֗ימָה <WH3117> ya-Mi-mah, to year אֲשֶׁ֞ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which מִצְּפ֤וֹנָה <WH6828> mitz-tze-Fo-nah [in a place] which [is] on the north side לְבֵֽית־ le-veit- אֵל֙ <WH1008> 'el of Bethel מִזְרְחָ֣ה <WH4217> miz-re-Chah east side הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> hash-She-mesh, east side לִמְסִלָּ֔ה <WH4546> lim-sil-Lah, of the highway הָעֹלָ֥ה <WH5927> ha-'o-Lah that goeth up מִבֵּֽית־ mib-beit- אֵ֖ל <WH1008> 'el from Bethel שְׁכֶ֑מָה <WH7927> she-Che-mah; to Shechem וּמִנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> u-min-Ne-gev and on the south לִלְבוֹנָֽה׃ <WH3829> lil-vo-Nah. of Lebonah
